hero.title: This is a large title for the hero section
hero.description: Here is some supporting text for the hero component, keep it short and sweet, but have a nice bite to it.

cards1.title: We provide advanced drug delivery systems

cards.title: Our flagship: Molly®
cards.content: Our most-wanted two-step device platform is modular and available for all. Fully customizable.

cards.title: Our products
cards.content: We have 15 single-use injectors and multi-use pens to choose from. Which one fits your molecule?

cards.title: Our services
cards.content: Need specific help? We can help you with any of the 10 different services we offer. Explore the possibilities.

cards2.title: One focus, many uses
cards2.description: Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae ab illo inventore.

cards.title: For pharma & biotech
cards.content: New to the market? We can lend you a helping hand. Let’s bring that molecule to the world, together.

cards.title: For start-ups
cards.content: New to the market? We can lend you a helping hand. Let’s bring that molecule to the world, together.

cards3.title: Discover the latest news, events and insights

cards.title: SHL Medical expert to speak at Novartis Campus in Basel
cards.content: SHL Medical will be in Basel for the Drug-Device Combination Products for Parenteral Use workshop.

cards.title: Strengthening a global manufacturing network through advanced simulation technologies
cards.content: In the Pre-filled Syringes and Injection Devices Issue of ONdrug Delivery Magazine, published ahead of the 2023 PDA Universe.

cards.title: SHL to attend 2022 NSTC Science Train Program
cards.content: SHL Medical is excited to announce our first-time participation in the NSTC Science Train Program, 2022.

textMedia1.title: Introducing the Electronic Motorized Autoinjector
textMedia1.description: It's new, it's revolutionary, and it's here. Our flagship product Molly® is now available as an Electronic Motorized Autoinjector (EMAI).

textMedia2.title: We value diversity and strive for excellence
textMedia2.description: At our workplace, we value our international environment. We're not deterred by setbacks, but instead, we carry on with determination. We diligently research because we believe in the power of knowledge. Above all, our priority is always people.

textMedia3.title: Join us in crafting future healthcare solutions
textMedia3.description: Where innovation meets compassion in the realm of healthcare. We're revolutionizing the landscape of medical solutions.
